review: Dr Sunita has made my 2nd pregnancy journey post 11 yrs frm my 1st child a pleasant and memorable one. From the day one I met her she has been friendly and advised only on required scans and tests, monitored my weight gain closely and accordingly advised on diet n exercises. Inspite of having personal emergency she took utmost care to see that my delivery was done by a very good doctor . She was available to me on calls and msgs be it day or night. I highly recommend this Doc to all those looking for a friendly as well as an experienced Doc to be with you in the most important journey of your life. Thank You for everything Dr. Sunita* *** *** *** **** ***

review: This being my 1st consultation, I was a little apprehensive going in, but that all flew out the window the moment we started interacting.... It was so easy to express my concerns and get answers with patience from the doctor.. Very friendly, understanding, soft spoken.  No questions, be it a simplest of the simplest doubt I had, she answered everything with outmost care. Time just flew by... I would definitely recommend her to anyone in need...
